name: Bug Report
about: Help us improve!
title: ''
labels: bug

---

**Modpack Version**
You can find the modpack version in the title bar of the Minecraft window.

**Describe the Bug**
Give a clear and concise description of the issue. Include steps to reproduce it, expected behavior, and what actually happens.

**Logs**
Upload your latest.log and/or crash report using mclo.gs.
Issues submitted without logs will be automatically closed.

**Screenshots**
If relevant, include screenshots or short clips to help illustrate the problem.
